snippet: Andy Murray, accustomed to going deep into the Miami Open, was derailed in the third round on Monday, falling 6-7(1) 6-4 6-3 to Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray, accustomed to going deep into the Miami Open, was derailed in the third round on Monday, falling 6-7(1) 6-4 6-3 to Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov.

headline.print_headline: No Miami Final for Murray After Dimitrov Upset
headline.main: No Miami Final for Murray After Dimitrov Upset
